text: Thanks team. This automation looks like my better option.
Hi guys. I have a questions, hope anyone can solve please. is: Can I, call throw API data from pannels?

Hey everyone! I am looking successfully send a webhook to HubSpot's Webhook Workflow, via its GET Method. However, it works when I use the <http://webhook.site|webhook.site> URL, but not my Ngrok URL.
You can't send webhook to HubSpot using the webhook action, you can send data from the webhook action
Hey Carter! My goal is to simply send the "data" dictionary to HubSpot. What would be the best approach to achieve that?

G'day dev community. I am a new HS customer looking for best practices to developer custom code in a Workflow, especially when changing code, saving and then having to click the CustomCode box every time to test the refactor. Does anyone have any tips on how to make this experience a little more streamlined?
You can just push the test button and not the save button
The save button will update it for the entire workflow, but for iterating quickly I just run using the test button

Thanks <@U01QVR44MEY>. So changes made in the code editor are saved and can be tested, good to know. Follow up question, are asyn methods available when using the axios library? I need to return an output value from a post to a 3rd party endpoint.
Yes, they are supported to my knowledge do you have a code sample that's giving you trouble
i just figured it out. i had to add async at the entry point and then could use await on the <http://axios.post|axios.post>. thanks for the quick response.
Do you want to hop on a call tomorrow and I can walk you though this
Yes, let's do that. What time did you have in mind?
You can use the calendar in my bio to find a good time for you
